  var _gaq = _gaq || [];
  _gaq.push(['_setAccount', 'UA-11251639-6']);
  _gaq.push(['_setCustomVar', 1, 'Member Type', 'Free', 1]);
  _gaq.push(['_trackPageview']);

  (function() {
	 var ga = document.createElement('script'); ga.type = 'text/javascript'; ga.async = true;
	 ga.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://ssl' : 'http://www') + '.google-analytics.com/ga.js';
	 var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga, s);
  })();

</script>

Interested in the Unreal Engine? <br>
Visit the <a href="http://www.unrealtechnology.com" target="_top">Unreal Technology</a> site.<br>
<br>
Looking for jobs and company info? <br>
Check out the <a href="http://www.epicgames.com" target="_top">Epic games</a> site.<br>
<br>
Questions about support via UDN? <br>
Contact the <a href="ContactUDNStaff.html" class="twikiLink">UDN Staff</a> <br>

<div style="padding:10px 0px 0px 4px;font:10px Verdana;float:left;">
Unreal Developer Network
</div>
<div style="text-align:right;">

<style type="text/css" media="all">@import "rsrc/UDNCSS_test.css";</style>
<script src="rsrc/Main/WebHome/jquery-1.6.4.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script src="rsrc/Main/WebHome/jquery-ui-1.8.16.custom.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<p />
<style type="text/css">
#maincol 
{
    background-color: transparent;
    height: 100%;
    padding: 10px 18px 30px;
}
#tool {
    float: right;
    margin: 10px 0 0 14px;
    padding: 0;
    width: 215px;
}
</style>
<p />
The Unreal Developer Network is the official support site for both licensees and mod developers of the award-winning Unreal Engine real-time technology, including both engine licensees and users of Unreal Development Kit.
<p />

Support for Unreal Engine 4 can be found on the <a href="https://answers.unrealengine.com">Unreal Engine Q&A site</a> and the <a href="https://docs.unrealengine.com">Unreal Engine 4 documentation site</a>.
<p />

International developers may experience better speeds by visiting our East Asian mirror sites <a href="http://udn.epicgamesjapan.com" target="_top">http://udn.epicgamesjapan.com</a> and <a href="http://udn.epicgameskorea.com" target="_top">http://udn.epicgameskorea.com</a>.
<p />
<div style="width:672px;float:left;">
	<div class="section_wrapper" style="background: url('rsrc/Main/WebHome/section_bkgd.jpg');">
		<div style="height:171px;">
			<div style="width:286px;height:171px;float:left;">
				<img src="rsrc/Main/WebHome/ue3_main.jpg" alt="UE3" width="286" height="171" />
			</div>
			<div style="float:left;width:386px;height:171px;">
				<div style="margin:13px 0px 0px 18px;width:355px;height:62px;">
					<img src="rsrc/Main/WebHome/ue3_text.png" alt="UE3" width="355" height="62" />
				</div>
				<div style="margin:16px 0px 0px 26px;width:340px;color:#f0f0f0;font:10pt verdana;">
					Learn all the skills you need to master the #1 game engine in the industry and use the intuitive toolset to create engaging experiences, exciting gameplay and beautiful environments.
				</div>
			</div>
			<div style="clear:left;"><!-- clear --></div>
		</div>
		<div style="height:28px;background: url('rsrc/Main/WebHome/link_bkgd.jpg');">
			<ul class="link_list">

				</div>

					Learn the skills needed to use this powerful and flexible game engine and its toolset to create games that run on previous generation hardware configurations and platforms.
				</div>

	<div class="homebottomimage">
		<a href="http://www.epicgames.com/" target="_top"><img width="130" alt="Epic Games" src="rsrc/Main/WebHome/Logo_Epic-New.jpg" height="130" border="0"  /></a>
		</div>
		<div align="right">
		<em>By contributing information to Epic's Unreal Engine support outlets, including but not limited to <strong>Unreal Developer Network</strong> websites and mailing lists, you agree that any information you, your employees, assignees, sub-licensees, or representatives post shall become the sole property of Epic.</em>
		</div>

<p />
		<script type="text/javascript">
		$(window).load(function() {
			current_item = 1;
			$('.newsitem').each(function(){
				$(this).attr('id', 'news_'+current_item);
				if($(this).hasClass('default'))
				{
					$(this).show(); 
					current_slide = current_item;
					$('#news_radio').append('<li onclick="slideTo('+ current_item +');"><img id="news_button_'+ current_item +'" src="rsrc/Main/WebHome/slide_dot_active.png" /></li>');
				}
				else
				{
					$('#news_radio').append('<li onclick="slideTo('+ current_item +');"><img id="news_button_'+ current_item +'" src="rsrc/Main/WebHome/slide_dot_inactive.png" /></li>');
				}
				current_item += 1;
			});
			$('.arrow').each(function(){$(this).show();});
			num_slides = current_item - 1;
			$('#news_radio').width(num_slides * 21);
			$('#news').hover(function() {if(bDoAuto){clearInterval(AutoInterval);}},function() {if(bDoAuto){AutoInterval = setInterval('autoSlide()', AutoSlideSeconds * 1000);}});
			AutoInterval = setInterval('autoSlide()', AutoSlideSeconds * 1000);
		});
				bDoAuto = true;
				var AutoInterval;
				AutoSlideSeconds = 10;
				FadeSeconds = 1;
				bFreezeControls = false;
				current_slide = -1;
				num_slides = -1;

				function autoSlide()
				{
					var new_slide = -1;

			 		if(current_slide + 1 > num_slides)
			 		{
						new_slide = 1;
			 		}
			 		else
			 		{
						new_slide = current_slide + 1;
					}

			 		$('#news_'+current_slide).fadeOut(FadeSeconds * 1000, 'linear');
				 	$('#news_'+new_slide).fadeIn(FadeSeconds * 1000, 'linear');
				 	$('#news_button_'+current_slide).attr("src", "rsrc/Main/WebHome/slide_dot_inactive.png");
				 	$('#news_button_'+new_slide).attr("src", "rsrc/Main/WebHome/slide_dot_active.png");

				 	current_slide = new_slide;
				}

				function slide(dir)
				{
					if(!bFreezeControls)
					{
						clearInterval(AutoInterval);
						bDoAuto = false;
						bFreezeControls = true;
						var new_slide = -1;
		 		 		if(dir == 'prev')
					 	{
					 		if(current_slide - 1 < 1)
					 		{
								new_slide = num_slides;
					 		}
					 		else
					 		{
								new_slide = current_slide - 1;
							}
				 		}
				 		else if(dir == 'next')
				 		{
					 		if(current_slide + 1 > num_slides)
					 		{
								new_slide = 1;
					 		}
					 		else
					 		{
								new_slide = current_slide + 1;
							}
						}
	
				 		$('#news_'+current_slide).fadeOut(FadeSeconds * 1000, 'linear');
					 	$('#news_'+new_slide).fadeIn(FadeSeconds * 1000, 'linear', function(){bFreezeControls = false;});
					 	$('#news_button_'+current_slide).attr("src", "rsrc/Main/WebHome/slide_dot_inactive.png");
					 	$('#news_button_'+new_slide).attr("src", "rsrc/Main/WebHome/slide_dot_active.png");
					 	
					 	current_slide = new_slide;
				 	}
				}
				
				function slideTo(slide)
				{
					if(!bFreezeControls)
					{
						clearInterval(AutoInterval);
						bDoAuto = false;
						if(slide != current_slide)
						{
							bFreezeControls = true;
					 		$('#news_'+current_slide).fadeOut(FadeSeconds * 1000, 'linear');
						 	$('#news_'+slide).fadeIn(FadeSeconds * 1000, 'linear', function(){bFreezeControls = false;});
						 	$('#news_button_'+current_slide).attr("src", "rsrc/Main/WebHome/slide_dot_inactive.png");
						 	$('#news_button_'+slide).attr("src", "rsrc/Main/WebHome/slide_dot_active.png");
						 	
						 	current_slide = slide;
					 	}
				 	}
				}
		</script>
<p />
</noatuolink>
</noautolink>
